original: Pharmacometabolomic analyses of drug response are frequently integrated with pharmacogenetic studies. Pharmacogenetics is concerned with identifying genetic variations, such as single-nucleotide polymorphisms, in patients that may influence drug responses and treatment outcomes. The findings from pharmacometabolomic analyses can inform pharmacogenetic studies by correlating abnormal metabolite concentrations or metabolic pathways with p
